# Conceptual model

1. Express your conceptual model using rTisane.
```{r}
library(rTisane)
# Add here
```

2. Add the following line to the end of your program above: 
```{r}
# Copy and paste above 
# Replace <conceptualModel> with your conceptual model's variable name
updatedCM <- checkAndRefine(<conceptualModel>)
```

3. Run your program! Hit the green play button on the first code cell containing your conceptual model.
